Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue blocks or sections on positively charged slides
Purpose: To perform immunohistochemical staining for MAL to provide accurate, reproducible results for diagnostic evaluation by pathologists.
Container: FFPE tissue block or positively charged glass slide
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, drying oven, automated immunostainer (or manual staining setup)
